introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Josi Pilates Studio. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose and protect your information when you use our application and services.

autoCollected.title: 2.2 Automatically Collected Information
items: Device information (device type, operating system, app version)

thirdParty.title: 2.3 Information from Third Parties
items: Data from Google when you sign in with your Google account
Payment processor data for class purchases

dataUsage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
items: Provide and manage your pilates services
Send important notifications about classes and schedule changes
Improve our app and services through analytics
Process in-app purchases and manage credits

dataSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, rent or share your personal information with third parties, except in the following circumstances:
items: To protect our rights and safety

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction.

dataRetention.title: 7. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. Account data is retained while your account is active and for a reasonable period thereafter. You can request deletion of your data at any time.

childrenPrivacy.title: 8. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our app is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

internationalTransfers.title: 9. International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data during such transfers.

cookies.title: 10. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We may use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your app experience, remember your preferences, and analyze app usage. You can manage these through your device settings.

policyChanges.title: 11. Changes to This Policy
policyChanges.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you about significant changes through the app or by email.

contact.title: 12. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

acceptance.content: By accessing and using the Josi Pilates Studio app, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, do not use the app.

eligibility.title: 3. Eligibility
eligibility.content: To use our services, you must be at least 18 years old or have parental/guardian consent. You agree to provide accurate and up-to-date information.

userAccounts.title: 4. User Accounts
userAccounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

purchases.title: 5.1 Credit Purchases
purchases.content: Class credits can be purchased through the app. All payments are processed securely and are final, except as stated in our refund policy.

cancellation.title: 5.2 Cancellation Policy
cancellation.content: Classes can be canceled or rescheduled with at least 24 hours notice. Late cancellations or unjustified absences will result in loss of the class credit.

refunds.title: 5.3 Refunds
refunds.content: Unused credits can be refunded upon written request, subject to administrative fees.

studioRules.content: By participating in classes, you agree to follow all studio rules and guidelines, including but not limited to:

hero.intro: Nice to meet you, I'm Josi!
hero.description: Physiotherapist and Pilates Method instructor since 2005. Passionate about human movement and the development of body awareness.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Physiotherapist and Pilates Method instructor since 2005. Passionate about human movement and the development of body awareness.
about.extended:
Josiane received her first Pilates Method certification (PhysicalMind Institute–NYC) in 2005, initially drawn to the method as a complement to her career as a physiotherapist in Brazil.

In 2010, she moved to Montreal to deepen her knowledge in Somatic Education at UQÀM and was invited to give lectures and workshops on postural assessment, injury prevention techniques, and somatic practices (including Pilates) to undergraduate music and dance students at the university.

Thanks to her experience, Josiane is able to offer safe, balanced, and varied training. She is accustomed to working with a wide range of people, including athletes, circus artists, dancers, musicians, pregnant women, and seniors.

Working with Josiane, you'll be invited to move consciously and joyfully, while strengthening your body and improving your alignment and mobility.
